title: UTair Introduces I Choose Comfort ServiceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UTair Introduces I Choose Comfort Service Published on : Friday, August 28, 2015
UTair Aviation has introduced new add-on service options for economy class passengers who value additional inflight comfort and personal space. The new UTair I Choose Comfortservice package offers the following options*:
– Passengers can choose the option to select a seat within economy class seating that has additional leg space and/or a seat on the first row of economy class. The add-on fee for this option starts at just 990 rubles.
– Passengers can choose the option to book one or more adjoining seats to guarantee a vacant space next to them. The add-on fee for this option starts at just 1,490 rubles.
“We’re committed to ongoing improvement of the quality of our services and introducing new features for our passengers, striving to meet their expectations and needs,” said UTair – Passenger Airlines President Oleg Semenov. “We do everything in our power to provide UTair passengers with the most comfortable travel experience possible.”
The I Choose Comfort service package is available on all UTair flights departing from Moscow Vnukovo Airport. Passengers interested in additional information on the new service and how to order them can inquire at UTair stands at the airport.
* Services may be purchased together at their combined price. Service terms available on a first come first serve basis and may vary in availability depending on aircraft model and economy class configuration. Seats are limited. Onboard seating arrangements may be restricted to conform with flight safety reasons.
